metadata.title: CVE-2024-27355 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpseclib 1.x before 1.0.23, 2.x before 2.0.47,and 3.x before 3.0.36. When processing the ASN.1 object identifier of acertificate, a sub identifier may be provided that leads to a denial ofservice (CPU consumption for decodeOID).

criterions.comment: php-phpseclib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
phpseclib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
